ARABIC: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but those who desire anything more than that are people who have gone beyond the limits -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who covet more than this will be transgressors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for those who seek beyond that, they are transgressors"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who desire to go beyond such limits they commit transgression,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So whoever desires more than these two – they are crossing the limits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But whoever seeks to go beyond that, these are they that exceed the limits;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (but whosoever seeks after more than that, those are the transgressors)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whoso craveth beyond that, such are transgressors -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but those who seek to go beyond that are transgressors --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Whosoever seeketh beyond that, then it is these who are the transgressors
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but whoever seeks [anything] beyond that—it is they who are transgressors),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those whose desires exceed those limits are transgressors;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who seek beyond that are transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But whoever seeks anything beyond that—these are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:7] But whoever seeks [anything] beyond that, [intercourse with] wives and concubines, such as masturbation: those, they are transgressors, who have overstepped [the bounds] into what is not lawful for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But whoso craveth beyond that) but whoever seeks other than the lawful, (such are transgressors) who step from the lawful into the unlawful,
